mapper.select: select * from (select a.c_info_num, b.p_info_num, b.uniq_id_num, b.music_cat_code, c.music_cat_small, d.u_info from class_info a left join prof_info b on a.P_INFO_NUM = b.p_info_num left join music_cat c on b.music_cat_code=c.music_cat_code left join member d on b.uniq_id_num=d.uniq_id_num) where c_info_num=#{c_info_num}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT B.C_OPEN_DATE,C.C_TITLE, C.P_INFO_NUM FROM CLASS_CONFIRM A LEFT JOIN CLASS_OPEN B ON A.C_OPEN_NUM = B.C_OPEN_NUM LEFT JOIN CLASS_INFO C ON B.C_INFO_NUM = C.C_INFO_NUM) A WHERE A.P_INFO_NUM=(SELECT P_INFO_NUM FROM CLASS_INFO WHERE C_INFO_NUM =#{c_info_num})

SELECT C_OPEN_NUM, C_INFO_NUM, C_OPEN_DATE, C_OPEN_TIME ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE C_OPEN_NUM=A.C_OPEN_NUM) AS PAYMENTS FROM CLASS_OPEN A WHERE C_OPEN_DATE>SYSDATE+2 AND C_INFO_NUM=#{c_info_num} ORDER BY C_OPEN_DATE
